name: Dreamwalker Wristguards
tooltip:
Dreamwalker WristguardsLevel 60

Rayne at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Dreamwalker Wristguards if you bring her the following: 1 Desecrated Wristguards, 6 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 1 Arcane Crystal and 2 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Wristguards
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 6
- Arcane Crystal
- Cured Rugged Hide x 2
